content.rendered:
Events & Webinars

INSYNC Live Summit: February 2023

We welcome you to INSYNC’s fourth Summit, live in London on Feb 28, for a day of thought leadership, connection, and forward motion. Learn from the best, engage in immersive roundtables, invigorating panels, and find inspiration to propel your brand protection program to new heights.

Register interest

On-Demand Webinars

On-Demand Webinar | Focusing Your Brand Protection Strategy & Delivering Results

Experts from The Chemours Company and Corsearch share their tips and best practices to work effectively,…

Speakers:

  • Deborah Hampton

    Senior Trademark & Copyright Program Manager

  • Tosshan Ramgolam

    Pre-Sales Consultant (Brand Protection)

  • Jenna Curtis

    Lifecycle Marketing Manager

Read more

On-Demand Webinar | Navigating NFTs and Their Emerging Issues

Learn about the nuances of this emerging market and the threats posed to rights holders and…

Speakers:

  • Helen Saunders

    VP Product, Brand Protection

  • Svetlana Ilnitskaya

    Director of US Customer Strategy

  • Caleb McClain

    Client Manager, Brand Protection

Read more

On-Demand Webinar | How brand protection data can provide added value & drive strategy

Tosshan Ramgolam, Pre-Sales Consultant (Brand Protection) at Corsearch, discusses the ways in which the data available…

Speakers:

  • Tosshan Ramgolam

    Pre-Sales Consultant (Brand Protection)

Read more

On-Demand Webinar | Advance like Superdry: How to accelerate your brand protection strategy

Experts from Superdry and Corsearch share insights on how accelerating your brand protection strategy can drive…

Speakers:

  • James Sweeting

    Deputy General Counsel

  • Piers Barclay

    VP Strategy & Marketing

  • Annie Wood

    Vice President of Customer Success

Read more

On-Demand Webinar | How e-commerce platforms can protect consumers from repeat offenders

Experts from the IACC and Incopro review real-world data on the volume of repeat infringement online,…

Speakers:

  • Simon Baggs

    President, Brand & Content Protection

  • Travis Johnson

    Vice President – Legislative Affairs, Senior Counsel

  • +2
Read more

On-Demand Webinar | The business models of bad actors: How to Discover & Disrupt Them

Brand protection experts discuss why understanding bad actors' operating models and uncovering their online networks is…

Speakers:

  • Helen Saunders

    VP Product, Brand Protection

  • Alex Shad

    Brand Protection Team Lead

  • Laurence Baker

    Brand Protection Analyst

Request your Demo

The demo is personalized for you. Get answers to your questions and find out why Incopro is the right choice for you.
